channel.title: careers on Dwarves Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in careers on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: Making a career
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Look, the tech industry’s relationship with employee tenure is… weird. A year here, a year there. It’s often treated like collecting stamps.

item.title: How we hire
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Why we hire the way we do Hiring at Dwarves means we need help, but not just any help, we need the right help.
